name: Investbrain
description: Investbrain is a smart open-source investment tracker that helps you manage, track, and make informed decisions about your investments.

notes.text: Access the UI via http://<host-ip>:8000/register to create the first user.
Default market data provider is Yahoo Finance. Configure others in `.env` with `MARKET_DATA_PROVIDER=yahoo,alphavantage`
Refresh market data: `cd /opt/investbrain && php artisan refresh:market-data`
Enable AI chat by setting `AI_CHAT_ENABLED=true` and `OPENAI_API_KEY` in `.env`
